question: My ears are red and hot?
question_content:
Something quite strange has happened to my ears today. I was just sat at the pc when my mum came in and made a comment about my ears looking weird, saying there was a straight line down both of them.. when I looked at them in the mirror theres like a perfect line down the centre of both my ears, half my skin colour, and half red. When I touch them they are very hot and even feel like they are pulsing. My ears are quite naturally red anyway but never hot like this and I find the line part quite strange.

Obviously Im not too worried about this, just curious really.

Any one else ever had this? What could be the cause?

answers.answer_content: Well as long as I'm mad, furious, or a little drunk (cause I never been very drunk and I won't be) or sick my ears turns red and hot. That's all, if things happens just go and see your doctor for that.
